data.title: TV couples who had an inter-religion marriage
data.meta_description: Actors Sanaya Irani amd Mohit Sehgal tied the knot on 25 January, 2016. The couple are touted as the Riteish Deshmukh and Genelia D'souza of the TV Town. The two took the plunge after a courtship of six long years. Sanaya is a Parsi and Mohit is a Punjabi.Photo- Instagram.
data.text:
Actors Sanaya Irani amd Mohit Sehgal tied the knot on 25 January, 2016. The couple are touted as the Riteish Deshmukh and Genelia D'souza of the TV Town. The two took the plunge after a courtship of six long years. Sanaya is a Parsi and Mohit is a Punjabi.Photo- Instagram.

The actors fell head over heels in love with one another during the shooting of their show Sasural Simar Ka. They turned into BFFs and soon were in love. The two finally tied the knot in February 22, 2018. Dipika converted her religion into Islam to marry Shoaib. This is Dipika's second marriage and they two are absolutely smitten by on another. Photo- Instagram.

Actress Chhavi Mittal and Mohit Hussein have been married for over 14 years now. The couple is blessed with a daughter Areeza and are excited for their little bundle of joy that's on its way. The lovebirds are head over heels in love with one another. Not many know that the couple had their own series of tough times when they revealed about their relationship to their parents, years ago. Chhavi is a Hindu while Mohit is a Muslim and her parents disapproved of the inter-religion marriage initially. It was Mohit who convinced them and slowly broke the ice and made Chhavi all his for a lifetime. They got married in 2004. Photo- Instagram.

The couple met on the sets of their super-fictional show Pyaar Ki Ek Kahani, and got married to each other in December, 2016 after dating for four long years. The couple did not let their religion or even their age come in between their love. Kishwer is 8 years older to Suyyash. Kishwer is a Muslim and Suyyash is a hardcore Punjabi. Photo- Instagram.

The couple met in their college and fell in love. The lovebirds dated for nine long years from 1996 to 2005 and tied the knot on December 21, 2005. The actors complete 14 years to their wedding and are simply inseparable. Hussain is a follower of Islam and Tina is a complete Punjabi girl. Photo- Instagram.

Chahatt Khanna got married to businessman Farhan Mirza in February 2013. They have two daughters - Zohar and Amaira. This was Chahatt's second marriage and the two chose their relationship over religion. Chahatt is a Punjabi and Farhan a Muslim. But last year, Chahatt levied shocking charges against her husband, and currently is staying separately from her husband. Photo- Instagram.

Aashka Goradia and Brent Goble married on December 03, 2017. The two dated for a few years and were head over heels in love with each other. Aashka is a Gujarati and Brent is an American. The couple is much in love and loves to travel and are seen globetrotting often Photo- Instagram.

Aamna Sharif got married to her boyfriend Amit Kapoor on December 27, 2013. It was a starry affair and they did not let any thing come as an obstacle in their love life. Aamna is a Muslim while Atul is a Hindu. Photo- Instagram.
